resources.string:
Melody Box
 Derived from Circle of Fifths (Copyright 2010 Peter Brinkmann
(peter.brinkmann@gmail.com)
http://nettoyeur.noisepages.com/) Copyright 2012 Jeff Kaufman
 (jeff@jefftk.com)
http://www.jefftk.com

Tap a field in order to play the corresponding chord. Change the key signature by dragging the rim of the circle. The top line of a button describes the effect on major chords; the bottom line describes the effect on minor chords.
